msbt.message: Even the small fossils tell a story. It's an ancient adventure that spans across eons andends up here.
A lot of the fossils in this room are ocean animals. So, I guess you could say it's like an aquarium!A boring aquarium, but still
These fossils are millions of years old! Ain't so impressive. There's lotsa rocks older'n that!
To think big ol' critters like this roamed around here, stompin' on and bitin' whatever they please.Boy, that'd make island life a bit more exciting! And wreck property values!
Every single one of these looks like a guy you wouldn't wanna mess with. Kindalike<20_2 arg="6" /><10_5 />me. Gahaha!
They used to call these fellas "Thunder Lizards" on account of 'em bein' so big and noisy."Thunder Lizard" was my nickname in school. No idea why.
Even the "new" fossils in here are hundreds of millions of years old. I think that's just false advertising.
If I were a fossil, would it be like this? 's head! 's body! Huh. Hey, When I get dug up, can you make sure I get dug up in one piece?
You think you'll go through life never seein' bones. Then you wander into a museum an' BANG! Bones all over!I've seen WAY more bones in my life than I ever figured I would.
So, see any fossils that are up to your fancypants I'm-from-another-island standards?
Back home, you ever see anybody stand real still, and be real quiet? Ever considered trying it yourself?

Might sound unlike me, but old stuff like this makes me think on how fleetin' it all is, y'know?Thousands of years' worth of critters just livin' out their lives Whole new species comin' and goin'And in the end they're just dusty ol' fossils like what's in this museum.And those'll go away someday too. Gone Like a deleted save game file.We get our shot, then if we're lucky, we get fossilized and stuck on a shelf with a nice writeup next to usIn a museum with air conditionin' up too high, and folks squintin' at our petrified bones all danged day long!So I reckon we'd best enjoy life while we're livin' it, !
The fossils in our new museum are great for tracin' back the branches on our family tree, . Wait, I meant on the tree of life! My own family's not THAT old!
We got us a museum here, and it makes me proud, .Heard they got some fossils already. Hope they can get a big dinosaur skeleton set up to scare the kiddos!
In case you didn't know, we got a museum of our own on this here island!That means I can go and look at fossils whenever I please! And maybe touch 'em, when no one's lookin'
